behavior.name: Turtlebot 2 Four-Level Flex Planner
behavior.author: Josh Zutell
behavior.description: Uses Flexible Navigation to control the Turtlebot 2 robot with 4-level planning. high-level: Map only first-mid-level: Smaller map area with sensors second-mid-level: Receives map from first-mid-level and performs another planning low-level: sensors only
